group_1.textCenter: ...for the future they want after the Automatic @Purification System has brought peace...

group_1.narration: "I just want to spend my days @with Nayuta, Mikage, and the others in peace, @with a vegetable garden, living a normal life..."
"I wanna spend my days with Hiko @and everyone in Neo-Magius, @slowly but surely getting people @to learn about and recognize Magical Girls."
"I'd like to spend my days as @a normal student quietly...@no, with a loud group of friends, @without having to worry about @life and death matters..."
"I'm still proud to be a Diviner of the Tokime Clan, @and will live for the sake of the Land of the Rising Sun, @but I'd also like to experience more ordinary days @with my friends."

group_1.textRight: There are so many voices. @The voices of hope.

group_1.textCenter: Although sometimes we may think about @if we hadn't become Magical Girls...
We all still see a future.

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@No matter how much sadness we feel, @no matter how many precious friends we may lose, @we don't give up.
―Iroha―@In spite of everything, @we continue to look to the future,
―Iroha―@and keep on striving desperately @towards a ray of hope...
―Iroha―@Countless times, we've considered things like @what if we hadn't become Magical Girls...
―Iroha―@Or what if we had done this or that... @And yet, we refuse to give up―
―Iroha―@Because somewhere inside us, @we still believe the future will end in hope.

group_1.textCenter: That "What If" world did have its fun parts...

group_1.textRight: But there are many relationships that could only happen because we became Magical Girls.
Looking back, it was pretty sad, too...
Felicia wasn't at Mikazuki Villa, for example...

group_1.textCenter: Many of us were saved by becoming @Magical Girls.
I know there are many things in the past @that draw us back,
but we still have to point ourselves @to the future.

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@Everyone's memories flow from the Kimochi.
―Ui―@There were happy times and sad ones, @but all of them together is what makes up now.
―Iroha―@Yeah. Everyone's resting their hopes on us.
―Iroha―@Then true happiness for me is...
―Iroha―@...to connect everyone's dreams @and weave a future that ends in hope.
―Iroha―@So, Ui, userName...
―Iroha―@Can you two accompany me for just a little while longer?
―Ui―@Of course we can!
―userName―@Mokyu!
―Iroha―@*Giggle*
―Iroha―@Then I bid farewell to this world of "What Ifs."
[textBlack:Let's seize our bright future]@[textBlack:by making the most of the present.]
